# contentful_team (Resource)

Manages a Contentful Team.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "contentful_team" "this" {
  organization_id = var.organization_id

  name        = "Example Team"
  description = "An example team"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) A human-readable name of the team.
- `organization_id` (String) ID of the organization that owns the team.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the team.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `team_id` (String) System ID of the team.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import contentful_team.this $CONTENTFUL_ORGANIZATION_ID/$CONTENTFUL_TEAM_ID
```
